rotate_lever.description: Rotate the lever to adjust the chair's height or backrest tilt.

rotate_caster.description: Rotate the caster to change the direction of the chair.

spin_wheel.description: Spin the wheel to check if it moves smoothly.

clean_seat.description: Clean the seat to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_chair_leg.description: Clean the chair leg to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_chair.description: Clean the entire chair, including the lever, caster, wheel, seat, and chair leg.
